body_html: I do not think our configure script or our bazelrc template has the --action_env flag set. It looks like you have these options in your /etc/bazel.bazelrc file. Could you share its contents?
body_text: I do not think our configure script or our bazelrc template has the --action_env flag set. It looks like you have these options in your /etc/bazel.bazelrc file. Could you share its contents?
body: I do not think our configure script or our bazelrc template has the `--action_env` flag set. It looks like you have these options in your `/etc/bazel.bazelrc` file. Could you share its contents?
